data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 293,500 souls living in the state of Tai Po with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tai Po, Hong Kong
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 17,963 believers in Tai Po, Hong Kong a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary: On average, 24 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Tai Po, Hong Kong.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 293,500 people living in Tai Po.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Tai Po to exponentially multiply disciples.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Tai Po, Hong Kong not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Tai Po, Hong Kong.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Tai Po to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.section_summary:
the state of Tai Po, Hong Kong has a population of 293,500.

We estimate Tai Po has 17,963 people who might know Jesus, 20,443 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 255,094 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 16 neighbors who need Jesus.
